trans-unit.source: dotnet-publish
trans-unit.target: dotnet-publish

trans-unit.source: dotnet-publish
trans-unit.target: dotnet-publish

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: dotnet-publish
trans-unit.target: dotnet-publish

trans-unit.source: NAME
trans-unit.target: NAME

trans-unit.source: - Packs the application and all of its dependencies into a folder getting it ready for publishing
trans-unit.target: - Packs the application and all of its dependencies into a folder getting it ready for publishing

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: SYNOPSIS

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: DESCRIPTION

trans-unit.source: compiles the application, reads through its dependencies specified in the `project.json` file and publishes the resulting set of files to a directory.
trans-unit.target: compiles the application, reads through its dependencies specified in the `project.json` file and publishes the resulting set of files to a directory.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the type of portable app, the resulting directory will contain the following:
trans-unit.target: Depending on the type of portable app, the resulting directory will contain the following:

trans-unit.source: **Portable application** - application's intermediate language (IL) code and all of application's managed dependencies.
trans-unit.target: **Portable application** - application's intermediate language (IL) code and all of application's managed dependencies.

trans-unit.source: **Portable application with native dependencies** - same as above with a sub-directory for the supported platform of each native dependency.
trans-unit.target: **Portable application with native dependencies** - same as above with a sub-directory for the supported platform of each native dependency.

trans-unit.source: **Self-contained application** - same as above plus the entire runtime for the targeted platform.
trans-unit.target: **Self-contained application** - same as above plus the entire runtime for the targeted platform.

trans-unit.source: The above types are covered in more details in the [types of portable applications](../app-types.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: The above types are covered in more details in the [types of portable applications](../app-types.md) topic.

trans-unit.source: OPTIONS
trans-unit.target: OPTIONS

trans-unit.source: needs access to the `project.json` file to work.
trans-unit.target: needs access to the `project.json` file to work.

trans-unit.source: If it is not specified on invocation via [project], `project.json` in the current directory will be the default.
trans-unit.target: If it is not specified on invocation via [project], `project.json` in the current directory will be the default.

trans-unit.source: If no `project.json` can be found, `dotnet publish` will throw an error.
trans-unit.target: If no `project.json` can be found, `dotnet publish` will throw an error.

trans-unit.source: , `--framework` [FID]
trans-unit.target: , `--framework` [FID]

trans-unit.source: Publishes the application for a given framework identifier (FID).
trans-unit.target: Publishes the application for a given framework identifier (FID).

trans-unit.source: If not specified, FID is read from `project.json`.
trans-unit.target: If not specified, FID is read from `project.json`.

trans-unit.source: In no valid framework is found, the command will throw an error.
trans-unit.target: In no valid framework is found, the command will throw an error.

trans-unit.source: If multiple valid frameworks are found, the command will publish for all valid frameworks.
trans-unit.target: If multiple valid frameworks are found, the command will publish for all valid frameworks.

trans-unit.source: , `--runtime` [RID]
trans-unit.target: , `--runtime` [RID]

trans-unit.source: Publishes the application for a given runtime.
trans-unit.target: Publishes the application for a given runtime.

trans-unit.source: , `--build-base-path` [DIR]
trans-unit.target: , `--build-base-path` [DIR]

trans-unit.source: Directory in which to place temporary outputs.
trans-unit.target: Directory in which to place temporary outputs.

trans-unit.source: Specify the path where to place the directory.
trans-unit.target: Specify the path where to place the directory.

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it will default to _./bin/[configuration]/[framework]/_ for portable applications or _./bin/[configuration]/[framework]/[runtime]_ for self-contained applications.
trans-unit.target: If not specified, it will default to _./bin/[configuration]/[framework]/_ for portable applications or _./bin/[configuration]/[framework]/[runtime]_ for self-contained applications.

trans-unit.source: --version-suffix [VERSION_SUFFIX]
trans-unit.target: --version-suffix [VERSION_SUFFIX]

trans-unit.source: Defines what `*` should be replaced with in the version field in the project.json file.
trans-unit.target: Defines what `*` should be replaced with in the version field in the project.json file.

trans-unit.source: Configuration to use when publishing.
trans-unit.target: Configuration to use when publishing.

trans-unit.source: The default value is Debug.
trans-unit.target: The default value is Debug.

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: EXAMPLES

trans-unit.source: Publishes an application using the framework found in `project.json`.
trans-unit.target: Publishes an application using the framework found in `project.json`.

trans-unit.source: If `project.json` contains `runtimes` node, publish for the RID of the current platform.
trans-unit.target: If `project.json` contains `runtimes` node, publish for the RID of the current platform.

trans-unit.source: Publishes the application using the specified `project.json`.
trans-unit.target: Publishes the application using the specified `project.json`.

trans-unit.source: Publishes the current application using the `netcoreapp1.0` framework.
trans-unit.target: Publishes the current application using the `netcoreapp1.0` framework.

trans-unit.source: Publishes the current application using the `netcoreapp1.0` framework and runtime for `OS X 10.10`.
trans-unit.target: Publishes the current application using the `netcoreapp1.0` framework and runtime for `OS X 10.10`.

trans-unit.source: This RID has to exist in the `project.json` `runtimes` node.
trans-unit.target: This RID has to exist in the `project.json` `runtimes` node.
